items.description: Recurring payouts at fixed intervals defined in days or weeks

items.description: Regular Demo Day sessions for projects to share progress against milestones

description: Nouns Stream is a public good for payments across Noun-ish DAOs and beyond. It is an open-source, free, permission-less protocol that enables Phased (milestone-based) or Periodic (recurring) payments...

project.description: Public good for payments across Noun-ish DAOs and beyond
